p: The total phenolic contents of the plant extracts were determined using the Folinâ€“Ciocalteu method [ 31], and their free radical-scavenging activities were determined using the DPPH-scavenging and ABTS-scavenging assays, as previously reported [ 32, 33]. Antioxidant activities were determined using the FRAP assay, according to the Benzie and Strain method [ 34].
